content.p: There are currently no release quality builds of JFreeCiv.
These builds are generated every night from the latest source in cvs. Use them at your own risk!
Note: the binary distribution is not in a fully playable state. See below for how to run JFreeCiv.
The easiest way to compile the source is to use Ant. You should build the default target.

ol.li: Download a binary distribution or build a source distribution using the instructions above.

If you downloaded the binary version, try running lib/jfreeciv-1.0.jar (by double clicking it, or executing it under UNIX). This is all you have to do if your platform supports executable jar files. If you can't run JFreeciv, see the suggestions in the Readme.txt that ships with the binary distribution.
If you built from source, run JFreeCiv using: java -classpath jfreeciv-src/class org.freeciv.client.Client
